Instruction: Brown crumbled sausage, olive oil, pepper, and sage in a large skillet over medium heat until the sausage is cooked through and slightly crispy, stirring occasionally, for about 5 to 7 minutes.

Incorporate flour into the cooked sausage, ensuring it is well combined. Add milk to the sausage mixture and lower the heat to medium-low. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Reduce heat to low, cover with a lid, and continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until the gravy thickens, approximately 10 minutes.
